Data Structures

struct  Data

Detailed Description

VersionInfo provides means to supply version information for a specified subsystem. Using this class any part of the system can add version information to the system. The system maintains a list of VersionInfo objects that can be used to display or output to trace version information. Any submodule can add VersionInfo objects to that list. The VersionInfo objects will be linked at power on time automatically.
